values: (同一事物的) 不同种类；多种式样；各式各样；多种多样；多样化；多样性；变化；（植物、语言等的）变种；变体；种类；品种；综艺表演；综艺节目；杂耍表演

n. 社会；社团；协会；会社；交往；界；阶层；团体；上层社会；社群

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "状态, 性质"

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）
使多样化，使丰富多彩；使成杂色

word_mean_info__list.difference: 书面用词，特指有确切定义的群体。
普通用词，文体较kind随便，指对人或对事物进行的大概分类，有时含贬义。
书面用词，单复数同形。指生物分类上的种。
指根据已经确定的类型对某一实物作鉴别和归类。
正式用词，指门类、种类或优劣等级；用于指动植物的分类时，表示“纲”。
指客观界限比较清楚，有相同本质特点的同类事物，或指大致相似的同类事物。
强调有各自的特点，形式不同，品质不同的种类。
指性质相同，而且特征很相似，足以归为一类的人或东西。

word_group.phrase: variety is the spice of life

word_group.brief_definition: 综艺节目；综艺表演；杂耍节目
品种更多；更多样；更多种类
巨大的不同；品种繁多的；各式各样的
多种多样；无限的多样性
大量种类；种类庞杂；种类繁多

bilingual.source: This teahouse offers a variety of different teas.
bilingual.target: 这家茶社提供各种不同种类的茶。

bilingual.source: We're omnivores and we need to eat a variety.
bilingual.target: 我们是杂食动物，我们需要吃不同种类的食物。

bilingual.source: Why isn't there more variety of life on Earth?
bilingual.target: 为什么地球上没有更多不同种类的生命形式？

bilingual.source: I prefer Hogan Dos. They have a different variety of flavors of ice cream for you to choose from.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢哈根多士。他们有不同种类的冰淇淋口味让你选择。

bilingual.source: We also supply variety of tinted solar film for all types of vehicle, commercial and resident buildings.
bilingual.target: 我们也供应不同种类的防太阳薄膜，适合安装于商业大厦、办公室及住家等等。

bilingual.source: We strive to plant the pasture with a variety of different species in their grass to create biodiversity.
bilingual.target: 我们花了很大的功夫在牧场上种植各种不同种类的草，保证草料的多样性。

bilingual.source: In one task, volunteers wore stereo headphones while in the fMRI machine, and they reported where in space the variety of sounds they heard came from.
bilingual.target: 在一项任务中，志愿者们在fMRI机器中时头戴立体声音响耳机，由他们报告他们听到的不同种类的声音来自何方。

bilingual.source: And as four out of five dentists have reminded us on countless television commercials, using oneor another variety of toothpaste is crucial for keeping our teeth healthy.
bilingual.target: 正如五个牙医中会有四个在数不胜数的电视商业广告中一直提醒我们的那样，使用不同种类的牙膏对保持牙齿健康至关重要。

bilingual.source: And as four out of five dentists have reminded us on countless television commercials, using one or another variety of toothpaste is crucial for keeping our teeth healthy.
bilingual.target: 正如五个牙医中会有四个在数不胜数的电视商业广告中一直提醒我们的那样，使用不同种类的牙膏对保持牙齿健康至关重要。

bilingual.source: And so it may well be that although Albertosaurus lived in a wide variety of environments, in fact, it may have broken up into different species in those specific environments.
bilingual.target: 尽管阿尔伯特龙生活的环境各异，其实，它们可能在这些特定环境中分属不同种类。

list.abstract: variety，音标[vəˈraɪəti]，英语单词。作名词为不同种类；变化；多样性等。例句：Promote efficiency and increase food variety.（提高效率，并增加食物多样性。） variety的近义词有category，manner，nature等。

yingyinNormal.en: And many are in difficulty. We will have every variety of problem to study.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中很多目前处于困境，我们将遇到各种有待研究的问题。

yingyinNormal.en: The campus offers a wide variety of majors, but the crown jewel of MU is the Scaring School.
yingyinNormal.zh: 学校开设各式各样的科系，但最热门的就是惊吓学院。

yingyinNormal.en: And it clearly states that we ordered the Rivera bikini in a variety of sizes and colors. And...
yingyinNormal.zh: 上面说我们订的里耶维拉比基尼各种尺寸和颜色都有。

yingyinNormal.en: And it turns out that the Earth's gravitational environment isn't constant in its variety, either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但地心引力在各种变化中似乎也不是一直很稳定。

yingyinNormal.en: Genes that result in a greater variety of immunities may give offspring a major survival advantage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 免疫能力多元的基因可能给后代重要的存活优势。

yingyinNormal.en: People are overlooked for a variety of biased reasons and perceived flaws. Age, appearance, personality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 球员通常会由于各种偏见和臆断而被埋没，比如年龄，外貌，性格。

yingyinNormal.en: Me first. Okay. Quick question of the rhetorical variety. That's you, right? No. What do you. What do you...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我先说。好吧。有个反问的问题要问你，这是你吧？不是。 你什么意思？

yingyinNormal.en: Our renewable-energy needs are going to come from a variety of resources, it's not going to be one magic bullet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们对可再生能源的需求来源于很多能源不仅仅来源于一种。

yingyinNormal.en: But Ted doesn't just grow tomatoes. Like his neighbors, he produces an extraordinary variety of different crops.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但泰德种的不止是番茄，和他的邻居一样，他种了许许多多各种各样的作物。

yingyinNormal.en: As we are in fashionably health conscious cooking mode, I'm going to use a low sodium variety of light soy sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要制作时髦的健康饮食，我要用这种低钠的生抽酱油。

yingyinNormal.en: Also some rice. I'm using a variety called Thai fragrant, to which I add some sesame oil, chives and spring onions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有米饭，我用的是泰国香米，里面加入芝麻油、韭黄和葱。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I've got here some jasmine rice. Yep. I'm using a variety of rice called Jasmine, because I like the nutty flavor, but any long-grain cooked rice will do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我这里有一些泰国香米。是的。我用的米叫做泰国香米，我喜欢它的坚果香味，但只要是长粒米饭都能用。

yingyinNormal.en: Chinese food is as rich and varied as any on earth with thousands of dishes to choose from, all cooked in a variety of ways using a host of ingredients grown right across the vast nation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国食物丰富和多样举世无双，有成千上万种菜肴可供选择，都以不同的方法烹饪，使用的是中国本土生长的食材。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 变种; 异体; 品种

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 令人眼花缭乱的；各种各样的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 各种各样的；各不相同的；形形色色的
n. 不同种类；变化；多样性；品种；种种；变种；综艺节目；杂耍；植物栽培品种
adj. 易变的；多变的；反复无定的；可变的；可更改的；方向不定的；变量的；变异的；变型的；变速的
adj. 不同的；因时而异的；因事而异的；因人而异的

word_family.mean: v. 变化；有不同；呈差异；改变；使多样化

sense_info_list.en: several different sorts of the same thing

examination_example.sentence: The virgin forest with its richness and <highlight>variety</highlight> of trees was a real treasure-house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 原始森林树木丰富多样，是真正的宝库。

examination_example.sentence: To find their sites, archaeologists today rely heavily on systematic survey methods and a <highlight>variety</highlight> of high-technology tools and techniques.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了找到他们的遗址，考古学家现在极度依赖系统的调查方法和各种高科技工具和技术。

examination_example.sentence: The teachers' unions keep an eye on schools, the CCPOA on prisons and a <highlight>variety</highlight> of labor groups on health care.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教师工会关注学校，关注监狱，关注各种劳工团体的医疗保健。

sense_info_list.en: a type of a thing, for example a plant or language, that is different from the others in the same general group
sense_info_list.zh: 变种; 异体; 品种

examination_example.sentence: Trying to grow new <highlight>varieties</highlight> of grain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 试图种植新的谷物品种。

sense_info_list.en: the characteristic of often changing and being different

n. 社会；社团；协会；会社；交往；界；阶层；团体；上层社会；社群

word_usage.usage: variety表示“多种多样”时，一般用单数形式，后面一般接名词复数或集合名词，如：a variety of good shops 各种各样的好商店。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (同一事物的)不同种类; 项目
(植物/语言等的)变种; 变体; 异体; 品种

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 各种各样的；各不相同的；形形色色的
n. 不同种类；变化；多样性；品种；种种；变种；综艺节目；杂耍；植物栽培品种
adj. 易变的；多变的；反复无定的；可变的；可更改的；方向不定的；变量的；变异的；变型的；变速的
adj. 不同的；因时而异的；因事而异的；因人而异的

word_family.mean: v. 变化；有不同；呈差异；改变；使多样化

sense_info_list.en: the characteristic of often changing and being different

examination_example.sentence: Promote efficiency and increase food <highlight>variety</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提高效率，并增加食物多样性。

examination_example.sentence: Not so much the formal <highlight>variety</highlight> one obtains from a university but the informal <highlight>variety</highlight> that comes from credible work experience and professional accomplishments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不是指从大学中取得的那种正式资格，而是从可信的工作经验和专业成就中获得的非正式的能力。

sense_info_list.en: several different sorts of the same thing
sense_info_list.zh: (同一事物的)不同种类; 项目

examination_example.sentence: There is an urgent need for new crop <highlight>varieties</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 迫切需要新的作物品种。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the destinations I visit have stunning scenery, and I get to meet a <highlight>variety</highlight> of people from all over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我参观的许多目的地都有令人惊叹的风景，我可以认识来自世界各地的各种各样的人。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers, teachers, and artists are starting to see how drawing can positively impact a wide <highlight>variety</highlight> of skills and disciplines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员、教师和艺术家开始看到绘画如何对研究人员、教师和艺术家开始看到绘画如何对各种技能和学科产生积极影响。技能和学科产生积极影响。

sense_info_list.en: a type of a thing, for example a plant or language, that is different from the others in the same general group
sense_info_list.zh: (植物/语言等的)变种; 变体; 异体; 品种

examination_example.sentence: The scientists are breeding successive generations to arrive at <highlight>varieties</highlight> that incorporate salt tolerance but retain about 97 percent of the European rice genome (基因组).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家正通过连续培育以期得出既包含耐盐基因，同时又保留97%左右的欧洲水稻基因的品种。

examination_example.sentence: A season in the field will help determine which, if any, of the <highlight>varieties</highlight> are ready for commercialization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只需要一个季节的实地试验，就可以帮助确定哪些品种(如果有的话)可以用于商业化推广。

examination_example.sentence: As an EU-funded effort, the search for salt-tolerant <highlight>varieties</highlight> of rice is taking place in all three countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在欧盟资金的帮助下，这三个国家在同时开展耐盐稻米的测试。

examination_example.sentence: Each team is crossbreeding a local European short-grain rice with a long-grain Asian <highlight>variety</highlight> that carries the salt-resistant gene.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个队伍都将带着抗盐基因的长粒亚洲品种与欧洲本地的短粒大米杂交。

sample.mean: n. 正当；得体；合宜；礼仪；适当；礼节；规矩；正确；行为规范

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 各种各样的；各不相同的；形形色色的
n. 不同种类；变化；多样性；品种；种种；变种；综艺节目；杂耍；植物栽培品种
adj. 易变的；多变的；反复无定的；可变的；可更改的；方向不定的；变量的；变异的；变型的；变速的
adj. 永远不变的；始终如一的；恒定的
n. 变化；变更；变动；变异；变差；变种；磁偏角；二均差；变分

word_family.mean: v. 变化；有不同；呈差异；改变；使多样化

sense_info_list.en: several different sorts of the same thing
sense_info_list.zh: (同一事物的)不同种类; 项目

examination_example.sentence: Its great food <highlight>variety</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食物种类繁多。

examination_example.sentence: To provide customers with a greater <highlight>variety</highlight> of goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为顾客提供更多种类的商品。

examination_example.sentence: Modern techniques for producing and shipping food led to greater <highlight>variety</highlight> and quantity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现代生产和运输食品的技术使食品拥有更多种类和数量。

sense_info_list.en: the characteristic of often changing and being different

examination_example.sentence: These multi-stage lives will create extraordinary <highlight>variety</highlight> across groups of people simply because there are so many ways of sequencing the stages. More stages mean more possible sequences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种多阶段的人生将导致人群种类发生异乎寻常的变化，原因很简单，因为排序人生各阶段的方式实在太多了。人生阶段越多意味着可能的排列方式越多。

examination_example.sentence: With this <highlight>variety</highlight> will come the end of the close association of age and stage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伴随这一变化而来的是年龄与人生阶段之间紧密联系的终结。

sense_info_list.en: a type of a thing; for example a plant or language; that is different from the others in the same general group
sense_info_list.zh: 变种; 变体; 异体; 品种

examination_example.sentence: Supermarkets offer more <highlight>variety</highlight> than ever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超市提供的商品种类比以往任何时候都多。

sample.mean: n. 正当；得体；合宜；礼仪；适当；礼节；规矩；正确；行为规范
n. 社会；社团；协会；会社；交往；界；阶层；团体；上层社会；社群

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不同种类；变化；多样性；品种；种种；变种；综艺节目；杂耍；植物栽培品种
adj. 易变的；多变的；反复无定的；可变的；可更改的；方向不定的；变量的；变异的；变型的；变速的

word_family.mean: v. 变化；有不同；呈差异；改变；使多样化

sense_info_list.en: the characteristic of often changing and being different

examination_example.sentence: We will be holding a free taster session on 23rd May, to demonstrate the <highlight>variety</highlight> of effective and active exercises.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将于5月23日上午10点举行免费试听课，展示各种有效和积极的练习。

examination_example.sentence: Wander among a <highlight>variety</highlight> of shops selling gifts while enjoying a live music show and nice street entertainment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 徜徉在各种出售礼品的商店中，同时欣赏现场音乐表演和美好的街头娱乐。

sense_info_list.en: a type of a thing, for example a plant or language, that is different from the others in the same general group

examination_example.sentence: The skies and lands were alive with an astonishing <highlight>variety</highlight> of wildlife.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 天空和陆地上充满了各种各样令人吃惊的野生动物。

examination_example.sentence: There are <highlight>varieties</highlight> developed to suit specific local conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 开发了新品种，以适应当地的具体情况。

sense_info_list.en: several different sorts of the same thing
sense_info_list.zh: (同一事物的)不同种类; 项目

examination_example.sentence: One of the very best <highlight>varieties</highlight> for eating quality is Orleans Reinette.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食用品质最好的品种之一是奥尔良雷奈特。

sample.mean: n. 正当；得体；合宜；礼仪；适当；礼节；规矩；正确；行为规范
n. 社会；社团；协会；会社；交往；界；阶层；团体；上层社会；社群

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "状态, 性质"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不同种类；变化；多样性；品种；种种；变种；综艺节目；杂耍；植物栽培品种

word_family.mean: v. 变化；有不同；呈差异；改变；使多样化

sense_info_list.en: several different sorts of the same thing

examination_example.sentence: Not only are there benefits to health，increasing the <highlight>variety</highlight> of vegetables children are exposed (接触) to may also make mealtimes much easier.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 儿童接触的蔬菜种类越多，不仅对健康有益，也可能让用餐时间更容易。

examination_example.sentence: The Grand Canyon is home to a <highlight>variety</highlight> of plants and animals．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大峡谷是各种植物和动物的家园。

examination_example.sentence: Most of the people could make boats in a <highlight>variety</highlight> of shapes and sizes for travelling along the rivers and in the oceans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人可以制造各种形状和大小的船，以便在河流和海洋中航行。

sense_info_list.en: the characteristic of often changing and being different

examination_example.sentence: The book named <highlight>Variety</highlight> in the Animal Kingdom simply introduces the huge <highlight>variety</highlight> of the animal kingdom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《动物王国的多样性》这本书简单介绍了动物王国的多样品种。
